transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Hi ma'am. Vishal baat kar raha hu main IndiaMART se. Good evening.
Customer: Ha yes. Ha good evening.
Executive: Yes ma'am. Thank you clear hua?
Customer: Nahi abhi maine bhara nahi hai fill nahi kiya sir ye main aapko fill karke kal dungi.
Executive: Kal denge?
Customer: Ha. Maine kaha tha. Ma'am waise main aapko inform kar deta hu. Waise aapka buyer jo supplier ke sath jo bhi concern hai wo hamare paas yaha open hi hai ma'am.
Executive: Uske liye Shivangi ji jo hai wo aapke sath follow up kar rahi hai. Pichhe bhi kiya tha unhone. Shayad ek aadha din miss ho gaya hoga ya fir ho sakta hai us din wo available na ho.
Executive: Thik hai? To uske liye separately hamare yaha par concern aapka open ho rakha hai ma'am.
Executive: To agar as such meri side se koi pendency nahi hai to aap please mujhe permission dijiye isko close karne ke liye.
Customer: To agar aap close kar denge fir iska aage ka process kaise hoga fir?
Executive: Nahi uske liye to aap Shivangi ji se connect kar sakte hai ma'am. Wo aapko mail bhi kar rahi hai. Wo ispe work bhi kar rahi hai ma'am. Wahi hai iske liye.
Customer: Suniye suniye suniye. Aaj aapke bolne pe unhone mail kiya hai. Thik hai? Itne din se ye aapko pata hai maine complaint kab diya tha? One month ago. Ek mahina pehle. Thik hai? Aaj unhone response diya aapke bolne pe. To aaj main agar aap ticket close up kar dete hai to uske baad se fir ye case khatam ho jayega fir?
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi ma'am. Aap aisa bilkul bhi mat sochiye. Main ye keh raha tha isliye kyuki is ticket ke andar meri side pe agar koi pendency hai to aap mujhe bataiye meri side se kya work karna hai. Aapki side se nahi hai. Baki jo bhi hai Shivangi ma'am jo hai unki taraf se problem tha. Unhone koi response nahi diya tha. Aaj aapke bolne pe unhone bheja hai mujhe ye legal notice.
Executive: Further agar aapko koi bhi update chahiye hogi na ma'am. For suppose jaise aap ye concern agar mere se close bhi karwate hai and further agar aapko koi bhi information chahiye kuch bhi chahiye aap beshak mera is number pe bhi connect kar sakte hai aur jis number se maine aapko whatsapp kiya tha wo mera personal number tha ma'am. Aap mujhe chaho to uspe bhi message kar sakte ho ma'am. Don't to worry. Main aapko answer kar sakta hu dekho ma'am.
Executive: Main na aapko har cheez ka answer de sakta hu ki kya meri side pe hai kya nahi hai ma'am. Thik hai? Aur concern person se aapko connect karwa sakta hu apni side se kyuki main yaha par account manager ki agar main ki tarah agar main aapse baat kar raha hu na to koi bhi concern hai aap mujhse discuss kar sakte hai ma'am. Main aapko solution provide karne ke liye hu ma'am.
Executive: Thik hai? Baki ek cheez aur mujhe discuss karni thi. Aapke jo ma'am ye catalog hai na iske andar aapka catalog ka score thoda kam hai. Main dekh raha tha aaj baat karte hue.
Customer: Ha mujhe catalog bhi thik karwana hai agar aap kal mujhe morning me time dijiye to main isko update karungi.
Executive: Koi issue nahi hai. Main aapko morning me definitely apni side se call bhi kar leta hu. Aur ek cheez aur ye catalog me na kuch categories hai jisme waha par primary mapping missing hai. Jaise ek product hai aapka MS structural fabrication service ke naam se ma'am.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Thik hai? Iske against me aapne ek product add kar rakha hai line erection service ka ma'am.
Customer: Ha wo sab update karna mujhe actually iska na kuch order bhi nahi aa raha mujhe lagta hai kuch gadbad hai mere catalog me. Mujhe dekhna hai kal morning me ek bar aap mujhe 10 baje call kar lijiyega. Agar ho sake to agar 10 baje se pehle bhi aap call karenge to bhi chalega.
Executive: Hmm then main 10 main 10 main 10 baje ek bar try karta hu aapko call karne ka ma'am. Thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai chaliye.
Executive: Baki bataiye main close kar sakta hu kya?
Customer: Ha kar dijiye.
Executive: Thik hai ma'am. Ma'am aapke paas na feedback aayega. Agar aap satisfied hai mere solution se mere matlab meri side se to please aap mujhe uske liye feedback bhi dijiyega ma'am.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thank you. Have a nice day ma'am.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's catalog score is low.

- Primary mapping missing in catalog categories.

- No response from Shivangi regarding complaint.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to call in the morning.

- Executive offered personal number for contact.

- Executive agreed to close the ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call customer in the morning.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, update, feedback, support, follow-up
